name: Cuddly Crown Chaos! (Wendy Wildshape)
description:
Cuddly Crown Chaos was developed at the Global Game Jam 2015 at the NYU Game Center by Will Zhou, Wendy Wildshape, Lyndsey Jane Moulds, Angela Lee, and Kailin Zhu.

Music by Andrew Struck-Marcell, euphonium fanfares by Spencer Hale.

To play fullscreen in your browser, go here
